attributes.action: Call a General Election now so we can stop terrorism.
attributes.additional_details: The war in Syria was illegal from the start, sponsoring the so called "Moderate rebels" and the "Free Syrian army" was a geopolitical risk that was a clear mistake. Only the Great British people can choose the correct Prime Minister to lead us now. This is very urgent as we must take effective action to stop funding terrorism and hold David Cameron accountable for his mistakes.
attributes.background: Terrorism has sponsored by David Cameron and William Hague as well as Nick Clegg since 2010 and now threatens the UK. We must call a General election now so the people can vote on who is best placed to be Prime Minister and lead the UK to stop terrorism.
